name: Lightfall Sword
description:
When Eula uses a Normal Attack or Elemental Skill, this card will accumulate 2 Zeal stacks, but Eula will not gain Energy.
End Phase: Discard this card and deal 3 Physical DMG. Each Zeal stack adds 1 DMG to this damage instance.
(Effects on this card's Usage(s) will apply to Zeal.)

Each Zeal stack adds 1 DMG to this damage instance.\n(Effects on this card's $[K3] will apply to <color=#FFFFFFFF>Zeal</color>.)
